Great Barrier Reef From Sydney } Carnival Cruise Lines | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Great Barrier Reef From Sydney 10 Days | Sydney Roundtrip Bonus AUD$400 Onboard Credit per stateroom Deal Details Travel Dates 10 August 26 Sale Ends Nov 30, 2025 Priced From $1,379 per person Enquire Now Bonus AUD$400 Onboard Credit per stateroom Set sail from iconic Sydney Harbour on an unforgettable 10-day tropical adventure! Enjoy relaxing Fun Days at Sea with world-class dining, live entertainment, and endless onboard activities. Discover the crystal-clear waters of Tangalooma, Moreton Island, unwind at Airlie Beach, and explore the vibrant marine life of Cairns—gateway to the Great Barrier Reef. Cruise past the remote Willis Island before returning to Sydney refreshed, inspired, and full of amazing memories. Sun, sea, and smiles—your dream Australian cruise starts here! Pricing 9 nights in an Interior Stateroom Cat (4A) from $1,379* per person, twin Share 9 nights in an Oceanview Stateroom (Cat 6A) Pictured from $1,759* per person, twin share 9 nights in a Balcony Stateroom (Cat 8A) from $1,965* per person, twin share What's Included A variety of room types, with options to sleep up to 5 people per room Stateroom attendant and daily turn-down service Great options for all six meals — breakfast, brunch, lunch, afternoon tea, dinner and late-night, that is — at the full-service Main Dining Room or the casual Lido Restaurant Specialty food spots for breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacking Lemonade, iced tea, hot chocolate, non-bottled water and non-specialty coffee and tea Amazing stage shows, live musical performances, stand-up comedy and more Clubs, bars and lounges featuring DJs spinning, karaoke, piano sing-alongs and more Deck parties, game shows, trivia contests and more fun ways to get involved A fully-stocked fitness center, plus outdoor sports activities Pools and hot tubs for all, plus an Adults-Only Retreat Itinerary Day 1 Sydney (Embarkation) Day 2 Fun Day at Sea Day 3 Tangalooma - Moreton Island Day 4 Fun Day at Sea Day 5 Airlie Beach Day 6 Cairns Day 7 Willis Island (Onboard Experience) Day 8 Fun Day at Sea Day 9 Fun Day at Sea Day 10 Sydney (Disembarkation) Your Ship - Carnival Adventure Offering 13 decks and a world of fun at your fingertips, Carnival Adventure is perfect for families, couples and groups of friends who are looking to experience it all. Sailing from Sydney, plus select cruises from Melbourne and Singapore, Carnival Adventure has a huge variety of activities on board, including exciting waterslides, four relaxing pools, a thrilling Edge Adventure Park, plus a huge range of bars, entertainment and dining options. You might start your day at the waterslides, or Edge, complete with ziplining, rock climbing and abseiling. Then enjoy a lazy morning poolside, followed by a delicious family lunch. Or, how about a relaxing massage at the day spa while the kids have the time of their lives in the kids clubs? Throw delicious dining at Luke’s Bar & Grill, great bars, and world-class entertainment into the mix and you’ve got yourself a holiday lineup that can only be described as an adventure — a Carnival Adventure. We can’t wait to welcome you onboard! Terms & Conditions Pricing is correct as of 06 November 25. From price is per person twin share valid for sale until 30 November 2025, unless otherwise stated, withdrawn or sold out prior. Valid for new bookings only. Not combinable with other offers. Supplements apply for higher room grades, categories and fare types. Some rooms have obstructed views. Offer ends 30-11-25 unless sold out prior. Offer is available on select Carnival sailings a through July 2028. Advertised fares are available until allocation is exhausted and may fluctuate. ~50% Reduced Deposits: non-refundable, per person/twin share. 2-3 day sailings: $50pp, 4-5 day sailings: $75pp, 6-9 day sailings: $125pp, 10+ day sailings: $200pp. Remainder of the standard deposit and final payment for all guests is due on final payment due date. Offer is not valid for bookings made within the final payment period. ^Onboard Credit (OBC) if applicable is per room, in AUD and applied to the first 2 guests in the room only. Amount varies by itinerary duration as specified. For cruises 2-5 days: $100pp (up to $200 per room). For cruises 6+ days: $200pp (up to $400 per room). OBC expires at the conclusion of your cruise, is not refundable, transferable, redeemable for cash. All travel is subject to the Carnival Cruise Line. Ships' Registry: The Bahamas and Panama.
